name: Yggdrasil farmhotel retreat & spa
description: Yggdrasil farmhotel retreat & spa is located on Kvaløya island, 50-minutes drive from central Tromsø. Free WiFi access is available at the farm. Guests can enjoy Norwegian dishes at the on-site restaurant, based on local and organic ingredients. The accommodation options will provide you with a patio and either private or shared bathroom facilities. Some accommodation options have private kitchen facilities. All rooms offer a view. A buffet breakfast with homemade bread is available, as well as a cafe and bar. At Yggdrasiltunet, guests will find a hot tub, sauna, garden and terrace with panoramic views. Other facilities offered at the property include a shared lounge. Horses, sheep, chickens and rabbits live on the farm. An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including cycling and hiking. Yggdrasiltunet is 30 km from Langnes Airport. The summer ferry from Brensholmen to Botnhamn on Senja island is a 17-minute drive away.
